channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16522] Procedure v2 - Cache system user and avoid IOException
item.description: We can cache the system user and avoid the IOException that we have to carry around when we create procedures
item.summary: Procedure v2 - Cache system user and avoid IOException

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
